works.complaint:
a.	The website states: "Any investigation on this scam
 
company will prove what we all are saying.They are crooks ...plain and  
simple"

The site suggests a link between a company called Spectre.

b.	ASI club/ASi Group is not a "scam company". I have never operated a  
scam. I have not been charged, arrested, or convicted of any dishonesty  
offence. I would not be involved with any offences of this nature.

We are not crooks, and I have never been aware of a company called
Spectre.

This is a comment designed to harm my business, a small company employing 

less than 10 people.

c.	These comments harm my reputation in and cause damage to my business.  
The publishers and distributors of this material would be liable for civil
 
damages under the Defamation Act 2005 (Qld). Due to the possible  
retaliation, and threat to my safety caused by that the claims that in am 

engaged in criminal enterprises, this violates Criminal defamation
sections  
of Criminal Code Act 1899 (Qld).
